item.title: Supply and Demand
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: byÂ Gerrit Wenz If I had asked people what they wanted, they would have said faster horses. _Henry Ford_ Don't give them what they ask for, give them what they never dreamt of having... _Orson Welles_
